bibl.title: Acculturation and Assimilation: Continuity and Change in the Cultures of Israel and the Nations
bibl.note: Voir aussi: D. Mendels, Acculturation and Assimilation of Jews in Ancient Alexandria in the Fourth and Third Centuries B.C.E., ibidem, pp. 61-69. - Non vidimus. cf. Classics in Hebrew, 1980-1991, SCI 11 (1991/2) p. 214.
Kasher Aryeh, Notes and Elucidations on the Acculturation and Assimilation of Jews in Ancient Alexandria. [En h√©breu.]
